html:
For today only, B&H Photovideo has many lighting products on sale ranging from light panels, monolights, backgrounds and reflectors. There's so much gear that it's easier if you just go to B&H and check out everything on sale.

I've used some of this gear and found especially the 3 light GVM kit was surprisingly decent when you consider the price.

My favorites though, are;

  • COLBOR CL60R RGB COB LED Monolight $119 (Regular $199)
  • GVM Pro SD300C RGB LED Monolight (300W) $379 (Reg $549)
  • GVM PL60C RGB LED Pocket Light $149 (Reg $199)
  • GVM 800D-RGB LED Light Panel (3-Light Kit) $254 (Reg $359)
  • Raya Bi-Color 9″ Round LED Light Panel $64 (Reg $129)

Check out all the lighting and accessories on sale for today only.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
